name: akpobatuka: ragdoll tournament
description:
you can play with gamepad or on screen touch controls

keys on keyboard:

Arrowsperson movementW, S, A, D
camera movement
Xjump (hold to jump higher, tap to flac)
Ckick/punchRzoom +
Fzoom -
PageUpcamera up (in edit mode)
PageDowncamera down (in edit mode) / look at move direction (in play mode)
